title: ILS插件的Boss血条显示玩家血量不起作用
author: 夏陈朗
txt_content:
ILS插件的Boss血条显示玩家血量不起作用
ILS插件来源:
http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=482110

Boss血条显示玩家血量需要BarAPI支持
但是我BarAPI和BossBarAPI，甚至两个放到一起也试过了
插件配置文件的设置也没错
但就是在游戏里没显示Boss血条
我用的服务端是PaperSpigot
版本是1.8.x的

求大佬帮忙解决

replies.txt_content: 删掉BarAPI配置。在修改LIS的BOOS的选项，然后把BarAP发过来我帮你看看吧

2448023855 发表于 2018-1-26 12:06
删掉BarAPI配置。在修改LIS的BOOS的选项，然后把BarAP发过来我帮你看看吧
BarAPI的配置

replies.author: 夏陈朗
replies.txt_content:
2448023855 发表于 2018-1-26 12:07
BarAPI的配置
我又把BossBarAPI和Barapi试了一次
BarAPI的配置文件:
# 
# For the latest spigot fake protocol hacks
autoUpdate: false
testMode: false
useSpigotHack: false


bossbarapi的配置文件：
# bStats collects some data for plugin authors like how many servers are using their plugins.
# To honor their work, you should not disable it.
# This has nearly no effect on the server performance!
# Check out https://bStats.org/ to learn more :)
enabled: true
serverUuid: 6a8a0a1a-7aaa-4e5f-8040-4ccc51c23b51
logFailedRequests: false
